title: Cohomology and congruences
abstract:
These are notes of my lecture courses given in the summer of 2024 in the
School on Number Theory and Physics at ICTP in Trieste and in the 27th
Brazilian Algebra Meeting at IME-USP in S\~ao Paulo. We give an elementary
account of $p$-adic methods in de Rham cohomology of algebraic hypersurfaces
with explicit examples and applications in number theory and combinatorics.
These lectures are based on the series of our joint papers with Frits Beukers
entitled \emph{Dwork crystals} (\cite{DCI,DCII,DCIII}). These methods also have
applications in mathematical physics and arithmetic geometry
(\cite{IN,Cartier0}), which we overview here towards the end. I am grateful to
the organisers of both schools and to the participants of my courses whose
questions stimulated writing these notes.
